sentences.english: ” while two laughing children pushed her.
sentences.chinese: 两个孩子正乐不可支地推那秋千。

sentences.english: At this, I would be beside myself with joy and feel as if my heart were also flying high up into the skies.
sentences.chinese: 我仍然是乐不可支，心也仿佛飞上了高空。

sentences.english: And Middleton`s parents, Carole and Michael, also gushed .
sentences.chinese: 而米德尔顿的父母卡罗尔和迈克尔也是乐不可支。
